modShortDescription: Did you also wonder why only some vending machines still working? I changed even Ice machines to be still working with loot inside.
modDescription:
Did you also wonder why only some vending machines still working? I changed even Ice machines to be still working with loot inside.

What this mod does:

* Adds new item “Ice Pack” (Sack)
* Changes “Ice Cold” machines to be lootable, and include up to 10 Sacks of [Ice](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/) inside
* Added SnowBall -NEW

All ideas for improving this mod are welcome.

Created for A20.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Cronosus/7dtd/tree/main/IceMachine)** Client-side version (with icon)  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Cronosus/7dtd/tree/main/IceMachineS)** Server-side version (without icon)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/27853-cronosuss-mods-~a17-a20/).

**Credits:** [CronosusCZ](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/cronosuscz/)
